title: Software Builder Engineer
description:
Be the first point of contact for candidates.
Should post the requirements across Job Portals both in Japanese and English.
Assist to build a quality-based candidate database of high quality candidates as assembled from various databases and sources online and in person
Gather appropriate information from potential hires, and appropriately seek and source suitable candidates.
Conduct initial email and phone screening, arrange for interviews.
Develop and maintain solid working relationships with candidates

title: Reception desk
description:
Access control using metal detectors The job is similar to checking baggage at an airport security checkpoint. Those entering and exiting the data center server room will have their belongings searched using metal detectors
Through encounters with special people, you can become the face of a famous company that represents the world.
Emergency reporting and initial response (English available) As we are a foreign-affiliated data center, we have contracts with overseas customers. When an incident occurs, please report to the customer in English

title: CONTRACT - Engineering Technician (NTD)
description:
Supports engineers with setup tasks for development and manufacturing, such as PCB modification, cable assemblies, kitting, prototype repairs, and test assemblies.
Participates in schematic checks and design reviews for PCB board prototypes
This position is onsite in Redmond, WA, and not open to remote status at this time.
Design, construction, and operation of data infrastructure for analytical services for institutional investors
API development and data mart development for web applications for investment analysis
Development and operation of macro indexes using big data

title: Data Engineer
description:
You will be responsible for a full range of tasks related to big data service operations, including data collection, analytical infrastructure construction, cleansing, enrichment, and customer provision.
Depending on other projects you are assigned to, you may also be involved in API development, building BI environments, reporting for customers, and more.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
The company currently provides over 50 services spanning across B2C, B2B and it continues to grow by launching new services aimed at solving financial challenges for everyone.
The ID platform is indispensable for the company's over ten million users to use these services safely and conveniently.
Through the development of the ID platform, the team mission is:
Elevate product and business value through our innovative authentication infrastructure
Provide the pinnacle of authentication experience while ensuring supreme account security for all users
Persistently pursue technological advancement by actively exploring and integrating advanced ID technologies and standards

title: development engineer
description:
You will be engaged in system development to revitalize your business. In the future, you will aim to become a project manager for solving IT issues and a manager for large-scale projects worth several hundred million yen to help our customers further expand their business.
The company's strength is that its engineers with a proven track record of development propose and provide services aimed at solving customers' problems.
After joining the company, you will first acquire knowledge of the industry and industry through 'design and development' in various prime projects from major companies, and hone your proposal skills.
After that, you will be asked to perform a wide range of tasks such as requirement definition and business improvement proposals.
You will be involved in the work.
After acquiring consistent skills, you will be asked to take on the challenge of being responsible for prime projects and managing large-scale projects.

Japanese to Thai translation of system Q&A
Work-related interactions with Thai staff
Conference interpretation
Document creation, etc.
